languages.text: "О шерин, мо{mf|й|я} заверитель{mf||ница}, мой спасительный луч надежды, моя путеводная звезда! Прошу, не бросайте наше дело, когда мы почти у цели!"

traits.locale_text: "О шерин, мо{mf|й|я} заверитель{mf||ница}, мой спасительный луч надежды, моя путеводная звезда! Прошу, не бросайте наше дело, когда мы почти у цели!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"
languages.original_text: "О шерин, мо{mf|й|я} заверитель{mf||ница}, мой спасительный луч надежды, моя путеводная звезда! Прошу, не бросайте наше дело, когда мы почти у цели!"

traits.locale_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “噢，亲爱的，我的赞助人，我的希望之光，我的启明之星！我们马上就能实现目标了，请不要在这种时候放弃我们的使命！”
languages.original_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，亲爱的，我的赞助人，我的希望之光，我的启明之星！我们马上就能实现目标了，请不要在这种时候放弃我们的使命！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Oh, shereen, mi mecenas, mi esperanza celestial, mi estrella guía! ¡Por favor, no abandone nuestra misión ahora que la meta está a la vista!».
languages.original_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, shereen, mi mecenas, mi esperanza celestial, mi estrella guía! ¡Por favor, no abandone nuestra misión ahora que la meta está a la vista!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ああシェリーン、アタシのスポンサー、天に至る希望の光、導きのお星様！頼むって、あとちょっとでゴールなんだからアタシらの目的を果たさずに諦めないでよ！」」
languages.original_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああダーリン、アタシのスポンサー、天に至る希望の光、導きのお星様！頼むって、あとちょっとでゴールなんだからアタシらの目的を果たさずに諦めないでよ！」」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ô shereen, mon auguste mécène, ma lueur d'espoir venue du ciel, mon astre tutélaire ! Je vous conjure de ne pas renoncer alors que nous sommes si près du but ! »
languages.original_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"

traits.locale_text: « Ô shereen, mon auguste mécène, ma lueur d'espoir venue du ciel, mon astre tutélaire ! Je vous conjure de ne pas renoncer alors que nous sommes si près du but ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O Shereen, {mf|mein Gönner|meiner Gönnerin,} mein vom Himmel geschickter Hoffnungsstrahl, mein Leitstern! Bitte brecht unsere Mission nicht ab, wo wir unser Ziel nun fast erreicht haben!"
languages.original_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"

traits.locale_text: "O Shereen, {mf|mein Gönner|meiner Gönnerin,} mein vom Himmel geschickter Hoffnungsstrahl, mein Leitstern! Bitte brecht unsere Mission nicht ab, wo wir unser Ziel nun fast erreicht haben!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ama şirinim, kefilim, gözümün nuru, rehber yıldızım! N'olur, n'olur hazır hedefimize bu kadar yaklaşmışken vazgeçmeyelim!"
languages.original_text: "O shereen, my sponsor, my heaven-sent light of hope, my guiding star! Please, do not abandon our mission when we have almost reached our goal!"

traits.locale_text: "Ama şirinim, kefilim, gözümün nuru, rehber yıldızım! N'olur, n'olur hazır hedefimize bu kadar yaklaşmışken vazgeçmeyelim!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
